name: Jank 'n' Pon
description:
PITCH

You are Jank, a carrot-rabbit and you are looking for your best friend, a cactus in a pot in a big game of hide-and-seek! You will have to run and enchain the jumps to explore an interactive and funny world!

Will you succeed in finding the 100 hidden coins?

Jank'n'Pon is a demo singleplayer 2D platformer, mixing exploration and action, humour and great backgrounds. What would you say about a piece of fun?

HOW TO PLAY

To play in the best conditions, we recommend you to play with a Xbox controller. If you don't have one, don't panic! You can also play with keyboard. In this case, here are controls for keyboard:

  • arrows = move
  • spacebar = jump
  • X = search, action
  • B = map

Have fun!

We are 4 students and we realized this demo in (only) 4 months.
We hope you will enjoy Jank'n'Pon, don't hesitate to share and leave a comment!
